A

ActBasedController - Interface in ussr.model
Interface that a controller can implement to be executed by a scheduler thread instead of having its own thread.
ActControllerImpl - Class in ussr.model
Controller implementation that provides the activate method expressed in terms of the methods from ActBasedController.

activate() - Method in interface ussr.model.Controller
